document_data.name: Tehmak's Coaches
document_data.mainbody: ''' Tehmak's Coaches''' was a shop located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The shop stood on the northeast corner of the intersection of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and [[Coachlamp Lane]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The building stood three stories tall.
document_data.Activities: Tehmak's Coaches provided coach and transportation services with the southern regions of Waterdeep.
